text: Motion

Mamimi, order any you want
and as much as you want!

Consider this a little wrap party
since you had that long phot shoot right after a lesson.
Haa...
Oh, there a seasonal menu, huh...

Ah, but I'm not sure I can pass
up this curry rice gratin...

────Um
I've decided on what I want to order already.

Eh!
S-So fast...

I'd better decide quickly as well.
Let's see...
Motion
Ah, sorry. Let me take this call.

Ill step away for a bit
so can you go ahead and order your food?
...Suuure.
Motion
......Fufuu.
Motion

Sorry, Mamimi...!
That ended up taking quite a while──

You ordered quite a lot of food there, didn't you!?
Are you going to be able to eat all of this yourself?

Obviously I'm not planning to eat this all myself.
I went ahead and ordered for both of us.

You looked like you'd be staring at the menu forever
if I waited for you after all.

Ah, so that's why...
Sorry for making you take care of that.
No problemー

Anyway, should you hurry up and start eating?
The curry rice gratin is starting to get cold you know.
Ah, yeah.

Then, let's dig in
......!?

...cough. So spicy!?
What is this... w-water....!

Fufuu
Nice reaction.

Is this... perhaps, ....
full of tabasco...!?

Cough....!
M-Mamimi...!!
Fufufuu....

Producer, you really fall for pranks
exactly like I expect you to.

This is so funny,
it's blown away all of my exhaustion from today.

Cough....
... I-Is that right...?

...Well, if it's blown away you exhaustion...
I guess it's alright then...

...Ah
Just now, a second wive of fatigue hit me.

Looks like I'll need you to show me a few more
funny reactions after all. Proceeding to the next prank...

Oi oi...!
Don't play with the food any more than this, please.

Eeh....
So then, is it fine as long as it's not food?

Fufuu
In that case, let me just call for a waiter...

...! That's also causing trouble  to the staff,
so this one is also banned.

──Hey...!
M-Mamimiiiiii !!
